ceterms:description:
Getting a master’s or doctoral degree is worth the investment and the Graduate School at the University of Saint Francis offers several ways to make it affordable. From student loans and graduate assistantships to need-based scholarships and alumni tuition discounts, the Graduate School and the Office of Financial Aid can help make it possible for you to take the next step in your career. That’s our commitment to you.

Tuition for our graduate programs can vary by program.  Please check our website to get the most current information on our outstanding degree programs!
ceterms:name: Tuition and Fees (Graduate Programs)
